posts.post_content: ]Up for trade or sale is a nice T210 Dutch Revelle from the Virginia League. Card has been graded and SGC 40. I am looking to make a trade for a Series 7 card or two that's on my short list. Price is 700.00 shipped insured. Please PM me or at [url]t210redborders@gmail.com[/url][/email], thank you!
Reverse. Email for pictures right side up. They are showing correct in my files and post like this. I apologize.
